price: Dhugumatti, Nuti Qur’aana kana keessatti fakkeenyota hunda irraa namootaaf addeessinee jirra. Irra hedduun namootaa kafaruu malee didan.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
